channel.title: siana goodwin – Velvet Navy
channel.description: Relax in a world of velvet navy.

item.title: Siana’s food book
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description:
Hello! I’m sorry for the lack of a post for a while but as you can expect from a year 10 (now 11), I was nose deep in revision for mocks and songs to learn for concerts etc. and soon after, had a relaxing holiday break. Goodness knows how i’ll get along next year.. …

item.description:

item.title: Makeup
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description:
One of my many interests is makeup, i have always loved it from a young age when i would watch my mum do her makeup and try to mimic her, putting on her lipstick or some of my own barbie makeup. However, ‘normal’ makeup isn’t the only thing i have been interested in, fairly recently …

item.title: Art 101
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description:
My absolute favourite thing to do is most likely art so here i will be talking about some tips, art in school, experiences, favourite art types and pieces and much more. I hope you enjoy! Art styles: So there are MANY different types and styles of art like abstract, graphic, realism, cubism, pop art an loads …

item.title: GCSE formulas and equations
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description:
Since the government has decided to change the exam board, resulting in us students being forced to memorise every equation and formula for science and maths, I decided to give my younger readers and myself a head-start by laying out all (i think) of the equations and formulas needed for you in GCSEs. physics: W …

item.title: Scarlett and Elora short stories
item.dc:creator: Siana Jade
item.description:
Scarlett I woke up to another frosty autumn morning, clambered out of bed and left my covers in a heap then swung open my curtains and stared outside across the col-de-sac. The sun was just peeping over the tops of the cosy houses, glowing brightly on the frosty trees making them sparkle. The cars had …
